data.subject: Know Who You Are
data.lyric:
(Ou mata e matagi)
 I have crossed the horizon to find you
 
 (Ou loto mamaina toa)
 I know your nam

data.subject: I Am Moana (Song Of The Ancestors)
data.lyric:
I know a girl from an island 
 She stands apart from the crowd 
 She loves the sea and her people

data.subject: How Far I`ll Go (Reprise)
data.lyric:
There's a line 
 where the sky 
 meets the sea 
 and it calls me
 
 But no one knows, how far it goe

data.subject: How Far I`ll Go
data.lyric:
I've been staring at
 the edge of the water
 Long as I can remember
 never really knowing why
 I wis

data.subject: Where You Are
data.lyric:
Moana make way make way 
 Moana it's time you knew
